title: Evil Awe-Inspiring - Novel Updates
author: Dancing   跳舞
description:
Chen Yang (Little 5), the main character, used to be an ordinary person. One day, he suddenly got a chance to have a special ability to control his luck! Then peach blossom luck; the career luck and the wealth luck are all coming.

What will his life become when he can control his luck at will? Does he have beauties at will? Does he buy a stock and the price goes up immediately? How could there be such a good thing?

If one day you get a ring that can control luck, what would you do with it? If one day you get everything you ever wanted, what would you care about most at that time?>
